GOODESS PARVATHI,HER WHOLE FAMILY IS ALLWAYS OPPOSITE TO LORD SHIVA BUT NEVER PARVATHI
SHE ONE DAY CAME TO KNOW ABOUT LORD SHIVA FIRST LOVE, THEN SHE STARTED ADMIRING LORD SHIVA AND STARTED DOING MEDITATION
AFTER MANY YEARS LORD SHIVA IMPRESSED BY HER MEDITATION FOR HIM HE CAME TO KNOW THAT SHE WANTS TO MARRY HIM AND THEY GOT MARRIED
